features: PREMIUM QUALITY MULTI-PURPOSE DISPOSABLE HAND TOWELS - Made of cloth-like paper for greater softness and absorbency than traditional paper towels - Use for Drying Hands, Wiping Sink and Counter, Surfaces Cleaning and other general purpose drying applications.
LINEN-FEEL, EXTRA DURABLE HAND TOWEL - Has the look and feel of linen, but with the cost effectiveness and disposable convenience of paper.
IDEAL FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR LARGE GATHERINGS - these Napkins are great for entertaining at home and will make an excellent addition to any cocktail party or special event.

IDEAL FOR GENERAL HOME USE - This Towel is typically used in guestrooms and restrooms. Our guest towels will make an excellent addition to any powder room or guest rooms. Your guests will appreciate the convenience and cleanliness of linen-feel towels available, and you will, too
MEASURES 12" X 17" WHEN UNFOLDED, 8.5" X 4" WHEN FOLDED - Has a 1/6-fold design for compact storage and extra absorbency when folded.
body.description: Afford Yourself The Best Quality Multi-Purpose Decorative Guest Hand Towels By Bloomingoods – Starting Today!Go ahead and add an exceptional accessory to any of your home gatherings and events, with these premium quality disposable paper napkins that all your guests will love!Ideal Size For A Multitude Of PurposesThese extremely beautiful napkins, with a silver-floral design, are just as useful as they are pretty to look at. Combined with a size of 12’’ x 17’’ when unfolded, and 8’’ x 4’’ when folded, they are an ideal addition to your cocktail parties – but you can also use them to dry your hands, wipe sinks, counters, surfaces and many more! Premium Quality That Ensures Best Sanitary ConditionsWhen you are selling in such a wide market, there is only a handful of things that can make sure your clients will keep coming back for more; quality products is one of them. Our disposable decorative paper napkins are of the highest end quality!Best Possible For Pack Of 200PriceWe have given our best to offer you our 200-pack superior quality decorative linen-feel guest towels in the most affordable market price, without compromising our quality and we are proud to say that we, at Bloomingoods, are using them ourselves - and loving them! So, Don’t Wait Any Longer! Order Your Own Pack Of Superior Quality Decorative Linen-Feel Hand Towels By Bloomingoods Now – Before Our Supplies Run Out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and thick
reviews.reviewText: Hold up well to makeup removal, wiping the sink, drying hands, whatever you're probably using them for in the bathroom. Quality printing. Do not flush; these are sturdy. Not glossy, though.

reviews.reviewText: These towels are great! The open easely they are absorbent and look very nice

reviews.reviewText: very nice, good quality. There were actually a lot more than I expected! They'll last a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, no breakage
reviews.reviewText: These are my forever go to when I have guests. It’s so nice to have a clean towel instead of a towel you’re not sure who’s touched 😕 No breakage or leftover tissue on your hands!
